title: Calories in Seedless Green Grapes
meta_description: Discover calories in seedless green grapes per 100g, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Fresh, raw seedless green grapes (Thompson variety), with skin, no added sugar or preservatives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; check labels for packaged grapes when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of seedless green grapes provide ~69 kcal and ~18g carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: With 1 tsp added sugar per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g seedless green grapes?
Are seedless green grapes low carb?
faqs.a: No, ~18g carbs per 100g, mostly sugars, with 0.9g fiber.

faqs.q: How much sugar in seedless green grapes?
Do seedless green grapes have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.2g fat and 0.7g protein per 100g.

faqs.q: Calories in a cup of seedless green grapes?
faqs.a: About 104 kcal for 1 cup (151g); scale from 69 kcal per 100g.
